LanguageData.EntropyLink.label: entropy link
LanguageData.EntropyLink.description: A psychic link with another individual. Gain or loss of neural heat incurred by one will be shared equally between both.
LanguageData.Joyfuzz.label: joyfuzz
LanguageData.Joyfuzz.description: Psychically-induced feelings of warmth, comfort, and acceptance. This improves mood, but the lack of negative stimulation induces a mild stupor and reduces consciousness.
LanguageData.PsychicAnesthesia.label: psychic anesthesia
LanguageData.PsychicBlindness.label: psychic blindness
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.label: psychic breakdown
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.description: Deep psychic destabilization of the mind. Psychic breakdown last for days, causing mental disturbances of various kinds. It resolves itself with time.
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.stages.major.label: major
LanguageData.PsychicBreakdown.stages.total.label: total
LanguageData.PsychicBurden.label: psychic burden
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.label: neural heat
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.description: Despite being called "heat", neural heat is not a measure of temperature. It refers to a type of chaotic psychic energy in the mind which builds up when using psychic powers and dissipates over the course of a few seconds or minutes.\n\nIf neural heat is pushed past normal limits, it may cause temporary psychic breakdown and unconsciousness due to psychic shock. These conditions don't cause permanent damage.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.descriptionShort: Chaotic energy in the mind which builds up when using psychic powers. If pushed past normal limits, it may cause psychic breakdown and unconsciousness.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.safe.label: safe
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.overloaded.label: overloaded
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.PsychicEntropy.stages.overwhelming.label: overwhelming
LanguageData.PsychicFocus.label: psychic focus
LanguageData.PsychicFocus.description: Psychically-induced mental focus, increasing sight, hearing and movement capacities.
LanguageData.PsychicLove.label: psychic love
LanguageData.PsychicLove.description: Psychically-induced adoration. This increases an individual's opinion of someone else, and between adults increases the likelihood of romantic advances and marriage proposals, while reducing the chance of a breakup.
LanguageData.PsychicVertigo.label: psychic vertigo
LanguageData.PsychicVertigo.description: Psychically-induced loss of spatial orientation. This will cause flesh creatures to vomit.
